name: Gansel and Hretel
description:
Gansel and Hretel are children of a poor woodcutter. When a great famine settles over the land, the woodcutter's wife decides to take the children into the woods and leave them there to fend for themselves, so that she and her husband do not starve to death because the children eat too much. The woodcutter opposes the plan but finally, and reluctantly, submits to his wife's scheme.

They were unaware that in the children's bedroom, Gansel and Hretel have overheard them. After the parents have gone to bed, Gansel sneaks out of the house and gathers as many white pebbles as he can, then returns to his room, reassuring Hretel that God will not forsake them."Gansel and Hretel" is a Visual Novel featuring
  • linear & rather short storyline
  • nice background music & sounds
  • Steam achievements
